name: plink-ng

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: A comprehensive update to the PLINK association analysis toolset.

dependencies.name: blas
dependencies.description:
BLIS is a portable software framework for instantiating high-performance
BLAS-like dense linear algebra libraries. The framework was designed to
isolate essential kernels of computation that, when optimized,
immediately enable optimized implementations of most of its commonly
used and computationally intensive operations. BLIS is written in ISO
C99 and available under a new/modified/3-clause BSD license. While BLIS
exports a new BLAS-like API, it also includes a BLAS compatibility layer
which gives application developers access to BLIS implementations via
traditional BLAS routine calls. An object-based API unique to BLIS is
also available.

dependencies.name: cblas
dependencies.description:
The BLAS (Basic Linear Algebra Subprograms) are routines that provide
standard building blocks for performing basic vector and matrix
operations.

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description:
Automatically Tuned Linear Algebra Software, generic shared ATLAS is an
approach for the automatic generation and optimization of numerical
software. Currently ATLAS supplies optimized versions for the complete
set of linear algebra kernels known as the Basic Linear Algebra
Subroutines (BLAS), and a subset of the linear algebra routines in the
LAPACK library.

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.

dependencies.name: zstd
dependencies.description:
Zstandard, or zstd as short version, is a fast lossless compression
algorithm, targeting real-time compression scenarios at zlib-level and
better compression ratios.
